mapper.select: SELECT user_file.fileName,file.fileSize, user_file.id,user_file.parentDirectoryId, file.fileType,file.icon,user_file.absolutePath, user_file.uploadDate FROM user_file INNER JOIN file ON user_file.fileId = file.id where (user_file.absolutePath = #{absolutePath} AND user_file.userId = #{userId});

SELECT user_file.fileName,user_file.uploadDate, user_file.id,user_file.parentDirectoryId, user_file.fileId,user_file.userId,user_file.absolutePath FROM user_file where (user_file.absolutePath LIKE #{path} AND user_file.userId = #{userId});
